author: hudsonjameson
content: I have announced on the ACD Gitter that we are migrating to Discord and sent the invite link.

author: hudsonjameson
content: üéâ

author: lightclient
content: As part of this migration, will the EIPs channel move over too?

author: djrtwo
content: I believe that we will make EIP specific channels under the "eth1" category

author: lightclient
content: Will there be a "catchall" channel for EIP discussions (EIPIP, EIPs w/o channels, questions about process, etc)? I think it's valuable to have a place that the community can connect with editors

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm a fan of starting with a single EIP channel, and then we can break it apart as needed.

author: sky.cactus
content: Based on the Gitter channel, do you think there is an obvious win for breaking apart <@!543900561460822016>?

author: lightclient
content: I understand the desire for separate EIP channels, but right now I think 1559 is the only EIP that I'm aware of that would really benefit from a separate channel. As some of the 1.x work solidifies as EIPs maybe it will make sense to make more channels, but I think 1 channel plus the 1559 channel is totally acceptable

author: hudsonjameson
content: <@543900561460822016> let's start small with just this channel and see about making an EIP specific channel later. I think it's a good idea personally, but want people to get acclimated to discord first.

author: timbeiko
content: There is already a 1559 channel (<#692078615269212180>). I think a lot of the "big EIPs" have one: Account Abstraction, Code Merkleization, ReGenesis, etc.

author: gcolvin
content: We also have Magicians threads for most all EIPs.

author: gcolvin
content: And  Gitter EIP channel is currently used for coordination between EIP authors and editors.  I'm not sure what we gain by moving it.

author: lightclient
content: i'm not sure why we wouldn't deprecate that channel on gitter at the same time we deprecate the ACD channel -- AFAICT, they receive the most traffic and almost everyone in the EIP channel also follow the ACD channel
